Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles hosts Minnesota in their season opener on October 23, 2024.
The Lakers finished last season with a 47-35 record, while the Timberwolves had a 56-26 record.
The Lakers averaged 7.4 steals, 5.5 blocks, and 13.4 turnovers per game last season.
The Timberwolves averaged 113.0 points per game, 17.8 on free throws, and 37.8 from three-point range last season.
The Lakers have injuries: Jarred Vanderbilt (foot) and Christian Wood (knee) are out, while the Timberwolves have no listed injuries.
Others: The article also mentions other sports news unrelated to the Lakers-Timberwolves game, such as the fires in Los Angeles affecting home games for the Lakers and Clippers.
